author: Not available

text.0: Iudica, domine, nocentes me; expugna inpugnantes me.
text.1: Dem, drihten, nu           þa me deredon ær,
text.11: þæt ðu hire on hæle           hold gestode.
text.2: afeoht swylce           þa me fuhtan to.
text.3: Adprehende arma et scutum, et exsurge in adiutorium michi.
text.4: Gegrip gar and scyld,           and me georne gestand
text.6: Effunde frameam et conclude aduersus eos qui me persecuntur; dic anime mææ, Salus tua ego sum.

source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
